p.e:
THE COMMUNITY:
Despite it's size, the people who play this do
help out a lot when it comes to trying to keep
this game afloat and even thrive. I may be 
exadurating a little but I have seen loyal
members spend a lot of time and effort into
worlds which aim to bring more people to
this game.
Unfortunatly, most of the newcomers i've met
don't tend to stay longer than a day let alone
a week.
In the end, I hope the game pulls through for
the dev team.
